attributes.action: put more funding into adult stem cell research as opposed to embryotic stem cells
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been lots of research into both and the adult stem cells have been the most productive however in Britain most of the funding goes into embryotic stem cell research and we would like that to change

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Stem-cells/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
